name: Fuzzy Logic norms
description: Computing fuzzy-logic T-norms and T-conorms as new dataset features

inputs.name: field-id1
inputs.description: Field ID or name of the first operand

inputs.name: field-id2
inputs.description: Field ID or name of the second operand

inputs.name: norms
inputs.description: List of norms to apply, with params if needed (see README)
